column1: # CardDemo Transaction Type Test Fixture - CSV Format
# Comprehensive test data for transaction type reference validation and Spring Batch
# testing scenarios. This CSV fixture provides transaction type classifications with
# debit/credit indicators to support constraint testing
# and transaction processing business rule validation.
# - Section 6.2.4.2: Reference data caching and validation
# - Section 6.6.3.2: Spring Batch integration testing with CSV fixtures
# 1. Standard transaction types (01-07) with proper debit/credit classification
# 2. Edge cases for validation testing (boundary values
# 7. Business rule validation for transaction classification
# - Header row defines column mapping to TransactionType entity fields
# - Data rows provide test scenarios for comprehensive validation
# - Boolean values represented as true/false for debit_credit_indicator
# - 2-character transaction type codes as per COBOL CVTRA03Y structure
# - Type descriptions supporting UI display and business operations
# CSV Header: Maps to TransactionType entity fields
# STANDARD TRANSACTION TYPES - Core Business Operations
# Original transaction types from trantype.txt converted to CSV format
# with proper debit/credit classification for transaction processing
# Purchase transactions - Debit operations reducing account balances
# Payment transactions - Credit operations increasing account balances
# Credit transactions - Credit operations for account credits
# Authorization transactions - Debit operations for pre-authorization
# Refund transactions - Credit operations for refund processing
# Reversal transactions - Credit operations for transaction reversals
# Adjustment transactions - Debit operations for account adjustments
# EXTENDED TRANSACTION TYPES - Additional Business Scenarios
# Additional transaction types for comprehensive testing and validation
# Transfer transactions - Can be both debit and credit
# VALIDATION TEST SCENARIOS - Edge Cases and Boundary Testing
# Test scenarios for validation rules and constraint testing

column2: Maximum Length Transaction Description String Test Case
Sixty Character Description Test For Validation Boundary
